products.title: RoadMaster 300
products.description: The RoadMaster 300 is a high-performance road bike engineered for speed, agility, and endurance. Perfect for long-distance riders and urban commuters who demand quality and reliability on every ride.
products.Specifications: Lightweight alloy frame, 21-speed Shimano gear system for precise shifting, front and rear disc brakes for enhanced control, 700c high-traction road tires, and ergonomic drop handlebars for comfort and aerodynamics.
products.included: Water bottle holder, adjustable kickstand, reflectors, chain guard, and a quick-release front wheel.

products.title: TrailBlazer MTB X
products.description: The TrailBlazer MTB X is built for adventure seekers and mountain trail riders. With rugged components and shock-absorbing features, this bike conquers any terrain with confidence and control.
products.Specifications: 26-inch alloy wheels, 18-speed gear set, front suspension fork with 100mm travel, mechanical disc brakes for powerful stopping, aggressive MTB tread pattern for grip, and reinforced steel frame.
products.included: Mudguards, multitool kit, saddle pouch, spoke reflectors, and a durable side stand.

products.title: CityCommuter Hybrid
products.description: A stylish and efficient hybrid bicycle that combines the comfort of a cruiser with the speed of a road bike. Ideal for daily office commutes, grocery runs, or leisurely weekend rides.
products.Specifications: Hybrid alloy frame, 6-speed rear derailleur, upright handlebars, cushioned saddle with shock absorbers, 700x35c tires for smooth city rides, and V-brakes for reliable braking.
products.included: Rear carrier rack, bell, headlight, ergonomic grips, and built-in mud flaps.

products.title: Velocity BMX Pro
products.description: Designed for the daring, the Velocity BMX Pro is your go-to for freestyle stunts, park rides, and urban tricks. Reinforced with strong components for unmatched performance under pressure.
products.Specifications: 20-inch high-tensile steel frame, reinforced one-piece crank, single-speed drivetrain, U-brakes with alloy levers, freestyle handlebar with 360° rotor for bar spins, and stunt pegs.
products.included: 2 pairs of pegs, rear reflector, padded crossbar, branded decals, and tire levers.

products.title: EcoRide Unisex Gearless
products.description: A low-maintenance, eco-friendly gearless bicycle that delivers simplicity and style for riders of all ages. Ideal for morning rides, exercise, or casual rides around town.
products.Specifications: 26-inch steel frame with step-through design, comfortable saddle with dual springs, wide handlebars, durable caliper brakes, and high-grip tires for stable riding.
products.included: Front basket, rear-view mirror, chain cover, leg guard, side stand, and safety bell.

products.title: UrbanFix Fixie
products.description: A modern single-speed fixie bike made for minimalists who love sleek, maintenance-free rides. Built to glide through urban streets with confidence and flair.
products.Specifications: Hi-ten steel frame, 700c tires with deep rims, flip-flop hub for fixed/free wheel mode, high-rise handlebar for better posture, and dual caliper brakes.
products.included: Reflective tape kit, bottle cage, chain tensioner, toe clips, and branded seat wrap.

products.title: Adventure Women’s 27.5
products.description: Crafted with female riders in mind, the Adventure Women’s 27.5 is a versatile MTB that delivers comfort, safety, and performance on every trail and terrain.
products.Specifications: 27.5-inch lightweight aluminum frame, Zoom suspension fork, 21-speed thumb shifters, non-slip pedals, ergonomic women’s saddle, and knobby tires for grip.
products.included: Seat cushion cover, hydration bottle, LED tail light, handlebar tassels, and toolkit.

products.title: RaceX Carbon Pro
products.description: An elite-level carbon-frame racing bicycle built for speed, agility, and competition. Designed for cyclists who want nothing but the best from every component.
products.Specifications: Full carbon fiber frame and fork, 2x11 Shimano 105 drivetrain, hydraulic disc brakes, ultra-light aero wheels, integrated cable routing, and performance race saddle.
products.included: Clipless pedals, carbon bottle cage, high-performance tires, mini pump, and Garmin-compatible mount.

products.title: Kids Fun Ride 20T
products.description: A vibrant, sturdy, and safe bicycle specially made for kids aged 7 to 10. It promotes active play and independence in a fun and safe way.
products.Specifications: 20-inch steel frame, training wheels for stability, front basket, V-brakes, easy-grip handles, and anti-skid tires for safety on all surfaces.
products.included: Colorful streamers, toy horn, padded handlebar, spoke beads, and removable training wheels.

products.title: Electric Explorer E-Bike
products.description: A premium electric bicycle that offers pedal-assist and throttle modes, perfect for city commutes, long leisure rides, and eco-friendly travel with minimal effort.
products.Specifications: 250W brushless hub motor, 36V 10.4Ah lithium-ion battery, up to 50 km range, 7-speed Shimano gears, LED headlamp, and digital LCD dashboard.
products.included: Fast charger, rear rack, helmet, USB charging port, theft alarm, and instruction manual.
